item1.title: Introduction
item1.description: Welcome to MediConnect. In this privacy policy, we inform you about how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal data when you use our website/application.

item2.title: Data We Collect
item2.description: We collect personal information from users in the following ways:
item2.item1: Information provided by the user: When you register, log in, or complete forms on the site, we may collect information such as your name, email address, address, phone number, etc.
item2.item2: Usage information: We automatically collect information about how you interact with our site, such as your IP address, browser, device type, and pages visited.
item2.item3: Cookies and similar technologies: We use cookies and tracking technologies to improve user experience and personalize content and ads.

item3.title: How We Use Your Data
item3.description: We use the collected information to:
item3.item1: Provide the services you have requested.
item3.item2: Improve the functionality of our website and ensure its security.
item3.item3: Send communications about updates, news, or changes to the service (if you have given your consent).
item3.item4: Personalize your experience and show you relevant content.
item3.item5: Comply with legal obligations and resolve disputes.

item4.title: Sharing Your Data
item4.description: We do not sell or rent your personal information. However, we may share your data with: Service providers: Companies that help us operate our site or provide services (e.g., web hosting services, data analysis). Legal obligations: If required to comply with the law or a legal request, such as a court order.

item5.title: Protecting Your Data
item5.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal data. However, please note that no method of internet transmission or electronic storage is 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.

item6.title: Your Rights
item6.description: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal data, including the right to:
item6.item1: Access, correct, or delete your personal information.
item6.item2: Object to or restrict the processing of your data.
item6.item3: Request a copy of your data in a structured, commonly used format.
item6.item4: If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us at info@mediconnect.com.

item7.title: Data Retention
item7.description: We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy, unless the law requires or permits a longer retention period.

item8.title: Links to Other Sites
item8.description: Our website may contain links to other websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of those sites, and we recommend reading their privacy policies before providing any personal information.

item9.title: Changes to This Policy
item9.description: We may update this privacy policy occasionally. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page. The date of the last update will be at the bottom of this page.

item10.title: Contact
item10.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or the processing of your data, feel free to contact us at info@mediconnect.com.

home.title: Hearing Well Is Living Better
home.subtitle: We Are Here to Help You
home.text: At Clínica Audiológica Mico, we combine compassionate care, innovative technology, and a comfortable environment to help each person regain their hearing and improve their quality of life. From the very first visit, our patients receive clear explanations, comprehensive tests, and real support throughout the entire hearing adaptation process.

feature.title: Features Designed for High-Quality Hearing Care
feature.subtitle: Discover how our clinic is equipped to optimize every stage of hearing care, enhancing the patient experience and supporting our professionals with modern and efficient tools.

feature1.title: ✅ Comprehensive Hearing Assessments Explained Step by Step
feature1.description: We use advanced technology to perform tests such as audiometries, tympanometries, tinnitus pitch matching, and virtual reality simulations in free field environments. Each evaluation includes a detailed explanation, helping patients understand their diagnosis and increasing their confidence.

feature2.title: 🎧 Personalized Management of Hearing Aids and Accessories
feature2.description: From selecting the hearing aid to its fitting and regular check-ups, we offer free post-sale follow-up for 4 years. Our devices adapt to each person's needs and lifestyle, with invisible, powerful, or child-friendly options. We also have a solidarity hearing aid program for people with limited resources.

feature3.title: 🏥 A Modern and Welcoming Center
feature3.description: The clinic, located in the heart of Canals (Valencia), has been renovated and designed to provide a comfortable, accessible, and professional hearing care experience. We have a soundproof booth, spacious rooms, and realistic sound simulation technology that allows patients to hear how they will experience different environments before purchasing their hearing aid.

testimonials.title: What do people say about us?

testimonialsArray.text: I never thought I would hear so clearly again. The hearing aids are discreet and comfortable. The team was very patient and answered all my questions.
testimonialsArray.name: María González

testimonialsArray.text: Thanks to the hearing aids, I can enjoy conversations with my family again. It’s been an incredible change in my daily life!
testimonialsArray.name: Javier Martínez

testimonialsArray.text: Since I started using hearing aids, I feel more connected to the world. I even go out walking just to hear the sounds of nature.
testimonialsArray.name: Luisa Fernández

testimonialsArray.text: I didn’t realize how much I was missing. With hearing aids, I can now hear even the softest sounds. I feel more alive.
testimonialsArray.name: Beatriz Sánchez

testimonialsArray.text: I was afraid I wouldn’t adapt, but the specialists guided me through the entire process. Now I can hear perfectly!
testimonialsArray.name: Carlos Ramírez

testimonialsArray.text: I regained my confidence dealing with customers. I used to avoid meetings, but now I participate with no problems. Thank you!
testimonialsArray.name: Miguel Torres
